p: Following the binding energy calculation and interface N-glycosylation site analysis, 96 nonhuman ACE2 proteins were suggested to be effectively utilized by SARS-CoV-2; half of them have been confirmed by experiments (Table 1) and the other half are summarized in Table 2. Therefore, compared with the original list of 285 animals, our method considerably narrowed the host range. The predicted potential zoonotic animals are distributed widely, including pets, domestic, agricultural, and zoological animals that may have close contact with humans (Tables 1 and 2).
